description:
External bottom bracket won't give you trouble anymore. This tool takes them off in no time.

  • One end engages the 16 spline external BB cups
  • Other end removes the crank arm adjustment cap with 8 internal splines
  • For BB with 16 external notches and 44mm diameter
  • Compatible with Shimano® Hollowtech II®, Campagnolo® Ultra-Torque™ and Power Torque™, Race Face®, FSA®, SRAM®, Truvativ®, Chris King®, Phil Wood® outboard bearing, Hawk Racing, Token®, Fulcrum®
name: Park Tool BBT-9 Bottom Bracket Tool
